statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Portland cruises to a 69-52 victory over Pepperdine
article.headline: Portland cruises to a 69-52 victory over Pepperdine
article.linkText: Portland cruises to a 69-52 victory over Pepperdine
article.story: PORTLAND, Ore. -- Alec Wintering scored 15 points and dished out six assists, and each Portland starter reached double figures in a 69-52 victory over Pepperdine on Thursday night. Kevin Bailey scored 15 points, Thomas van der Mars had 12, and Volodymyr Gerun and Bryce Pressley chipped in 10 apiece for Portland (15-10, 6-7 West Coast Conference), which shot 51 percent from the floor. A 10-2 surge gave Portland a 52-40 lead midway through the second half. Amadi Udenyi scored eight straight points to pull Pepperdine within 54-48 with 7:59 left. But the Waves went cold from there, missing 12 of their last 14 shots. Stacy Davis scored 18 points on 8-of-11 shooting, and grabbed 10 rebounds to lead Pepperdine (15-10, 8-6 West Coast Conference). Udenyi had 14 points and Jeremy Major added nine points with five assists and three steals for the Waves.
